question_6.question: What is the purpose of a TriggerId in TimeXtender's API?

question_12.question: How can you view the number of automatic firewall rules created for an instance in TimeXtender?

options.option_a: By checking the instance's metadata database
options.option_b: By selecting 'Show automatic rules' in the Firewall rules section
options.option_d: Automatic rules are not visible to users

options.option_b: Disable automatic rules and create manual rules
options.option_c: Ignore the issue as it will resolve itself

question_14.question: What happens if more credits are consumed than are available in TimeXtender?

options.option_b: The account will be suspended until credits are added
options.option_c: The credit balance becomes negative and you will be invoiced
